Package com.jme.renderer.queue

Class GeometryList

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.jme.renderer.queue.GeometryList
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Iterable<Geometry>
    public class GeometryList
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Iterable<Geometry>
    This class is a special purpose list of Geometry objects for render queuing.
    Author:
    Jack Lindamood, Three Rings - better sorting alg., Kirill Vainer

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      GeometryList​(GeometryComparator comparator)
      Initializes the GeometryList to use the given GeometryComparator to use for comparing geometries.

      Resets list size to 0.

      Returns the GeometryComparator that this Geometry list uses for sorting.

      Sets the element at the given index.

        Parameters:
        index - The index to lookup
        Returns:

      • add

        public void add​(Geometry g)
        Adds a geometry to the list. List size is doubled if there is no room.
        Parameters:
        g - The geometry to add.

      • clear

        public void clear()
        Resets list size to 0.

      • sort

        Sorts the elements in the list according to their Comparator.
